head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ROMALEWSKI, DIANE OF BROOKLYN, NY, SUDDENLY ON OCTOBER 3, 2000

identified-content.person: ROMALEWSKI, DIANE OF BROOKLYN, NY, SUDDENLY ON OCTOBER 3, 2000

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ROMALEWSKI, DIANE OF BROOKLYN, NY, SUDDENLY ON OCTOBER 3, 2000

block.p: ROMALEWSKI-Diane of Brooklyn, NY, suddenly on October 3, 2000. Devoted daughter of Helen(Linda) and Anthony Romalewski; beloved sister of Alice Tuminello, Thomas and Steven. Adored aunt of Michelle Tuminello; loving life partner of Gregory Coburn. Friends may call at Charles J. O'Shea Funeral Home, 603 Wantagh Av., Wantagh, L.I., Friday October 6, 2-5 PM and 7-10 PM. Funeral Mass Saturday morning, St. Ignatius Loyola R.C. Church, Hicksville, L.I. Interment to follow. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Archbishop Molloy H.S. Endowment Fund, 83-53 Manton Street, Briarwood, NY 11435 or Polish American Folk Dance Company, 1001 Lorimer St, Brooklyn, NY, 11209. For further information call 516-731-5550
